CompanyDescription: The Millennium Development Authority was enacted by the President of the Republic of Ghana and Parliament of Ghana through act 702 on 23rd March, 2006. The Government of Ghana ("GoG") and the Millennium Challenge Corporation ("MCC") have entered into a Millennium Challenge Compact for Millennium Challenge Account assistance to help facilitate poverty reduction through economic growth in Ghana (the "Compact") in the amount of Four Hundred and Ninety Eight Million, Two Hundred Thousand United States Dollars (US$ 498,200,000) ("MCC Funding") and Thirty Seven Million, Three Hundred and Sixty Five Thousand United States Dollars (US$ 37,365,000) ("GoG Funding").
MainOfficeEmail: Procurement Agent - paghana@charleskendall.com and MiDA - procurement@mida.gov.gh
SuppliersEligibleForApp: All suppliers are eligible providing they are not on any excluded parties lists (i.e. the World Bank debarred list)
SupplierRequirements: No specific registration requirements. MiDA will issue, at least at 6 monthly intervals, a General Procurement Notice and this will be followed by Specific Procurement Notices for the indivudual procurements as they are advertised.
